channel.title: Change 1 user per ip to 2 users per ip
channel.description:
Helo i've got the whole 1 user per ip code
Here it is [code] for(int i = 0; i < server.playerHandler.players.length; i++){ Player p = server.playerHandler.players[i]; if(p != null && !p.disconnected && p.connectedFrom.equals(connectedFrom) && playerId != p.playerId && !connectedFrom.equals("localhost") && !checkLog("connect", connectedFrom)){ sM("Address in use!"); returnCode = 9; disconnected = true; return; } }[/code]
What do i change to make it 2 users per ip?
Help is appreciated Thanks

item.title: Change 1 user per ip to 2 users per ip
